instruction: Create a To-Do list for an individual who wants to become a successful AI researcher.
output:
To-Do List for Becoming a Successful AI Researcher: 
1. Learn the basics of AI, including programming languages such as Python, algorithms and statistics.
2. Gather experience by working on AI-related projects.
3. Spend time reading AI research papers and attending virtual or in-person conferences.
4. Stay up-to-date on advances in AI technology by reading relevant news, joining online forums, and participating in online learning programs.
5. Take online courses to expand your technical and theoretical knowledge of AI.
6. Reach out to professionals in the field to network and gain advice.
7. Find a mentor who can help you gain insight into the field and work on challenging research problems.
8. Build a portfolio of projects and research to present to employers and research institutions.
